alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 10:31AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 to 60 below zero. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...Today until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow on will bring a 2 to 3 inches of accumulation today and create difficult travel conditions with snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
